alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Jackson; Putnam; Smith; Trousdale; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 7:32PM CDT until June 30 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Smith County in Middle Tennessee... Northern De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Jackson County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... South central Trousdale County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 732 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carthage, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carthage, Watertown, Baxter, Gordonsville, Hickman, South Carthage, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Center Hill Lake, Granville and Edgar Evans State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 246 and 278. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Jackson; Putnam; Smith; Trousdale; Wilson
